meanings.sent1: The guildsmen gathered to discuss their next project.
meanings.sent2: The guildsmen worked together to improve their skills.
meanings.sent3: The guildsmen decided to have a friendly competition to see who was the best craftsman.
meanings.sent4: The guildsmen were the pillars of the community, supporting each other in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The guildsmen proudly displayed their craftsmanship at the annual fair.

meanings.sent1: Many guildsmen traveled from different towns to attend the conference.
meanings.sent2: The guildsmen wore their traditional attire during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The guildsmen formed a line to greet the visiting dignitaries.
meanings.sent4: The guildsmen's dedication to their craft was evident in their detailed work.
meanings.sent5: The guildsmen's camaraderie was strengthened through shared experiences.
